hero.headline:

Winning 
Strategies.
hero.subheadline: A team better than Harvey Specter in the Ukrainian strategic communications market. We perform systemic landscape analysis and develop optimal strategies to achieve goals.

expertise.label: Expertise
expertise.title: Navigating the Complex Landscapes of Power.
expertise.desc: Our multi-disciplinary approach combines sociology, behavioral psychology, and deep legislative expertise.

pr.title: Public Relations (PR)
pr.desc: Strategic communications for political campaigns and organizations. We build trust between you and your audience through media, events, and digital channels.

reputation.title: Reputation Management
reputation.desc: We protect and strengthen the reputation of political figures and organizations. Monitoring, analysis, and strategic response to information challenges.

gr.title: Government Relations (GR)
gr.desc: Expert navigation in relations with government authorities. We help organizations effectively interact with ministries, parliament, and regulators.

advocacy.title: Advocacy Campaigns
advocacy.desc: Systematic campaigns for implementing policy changes. From research to lobbying — we deliver results.

elections.title: Election Campaigns
elections.desc: Full-cycle support for election campaigns: from strategy to exit polls. Proven methods, accurate forecasts, effective solutions.

research.title: Public Opinion Research
research.desc: Sociological surveys and CATI methodology analysis in partnership with Info Sapiens. Reliable data for the right decisions.

moldova.title: Quantifying the Regional Sentiment.
moldova.desc: Our latest quarterly report on civil trust and economic expectations across the Carpathian-Balkan axis is now available for partners.

firearms.title: Firearms Regulation in Ukraine: What Citizens Think
firearms.desc: National survey of 2,012 respondents on Ukrainians' attitudes toward the right to bear arms and legislative regulation.

cta.title: Ready to Start a Project?
cta.desc: Contact us to discuss your situation. We provide free consultations to assess collaboration opportunities.

Footer.description: PGR Consulting Group is a Ukrainian consulting firm founded in 2019. Our mission is to develop productive, mutually beneficial relationships between different entities through quality research and strategic communications.

hero.label: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Our company is capable of performing a systemic analysis of the current 'landscape' and developing an optimal strategy for the client to achieve necessary goals.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.quote: To empower democratic institutions and political leaders across Eastern Europe with clinical precision in strategy, communications, and data analytics.

data.title: Data-Driven Insights
data.desc: Evidence over intuition in every decision.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: PGR Consulting Group was founded in 2019 with a mission to develop productive, mutually beneficial relationships between different entities. We study our clients' needs, analyze the landscape, and offer them the best strategies for achieving communication goals.
story.specialization: PGR offers comprehensive solutions in PR, strategic planning of election campaigns, corporate problem solving, public communications, and GR. Our team provides results in the most challenging environments.

diff.title: What Sets Us Apart
diff.gov: Government Experience: Our founders have direct experience working with Ukrainian ministries
diff.research: Research Foundation: Partnership with Info Sapiens provides quality data for strategic decisions
diff.intl: International Recognition: PGR experts regularly provide commentary for leading international media
diff.acad: Academic Connections: Collaboration with research institutes and participation in scientific projects

team.title: The Brain Trust
team.subtitle: Expertise
team.label: Leadership
team.desc: Our partners combine decades of experience in high-stakes political consulting, constitutional design, and public policy across the European region.

ruslan.name: Ruslan Rokhov
ruslan.title: CEO and Managing Partner
ruslan.bio: Ruslan Rokhov is a Ukrainian political expert specializing in government communications, democratization, and local self-government.

alla.name: Alla Dubrovyk-Rokhova
alla.title: Co-founder and Partner
alla.bio: Alla Dubrovyk-Rokhova is an expert in economic policy, government communications, and education development abroad.

data.title: Data Over Assumptions
data.desc: We base recommendations on quality research, not intuition or political expediency.

partnership.title: Partnership Over Transactions
partnership.desc: We build long-term relationships with clients, partners, and stakeholders.

results.title: Results Over Process
results.desc: We focus on achieving concrete, measurable results for clients.

ethics.title: Ethics Over Profit
ethics.desc: We don't take projects that contradict our ethical principles, even if they are financially attractive.

guarantees.title: Guarantees for Our Clients
guarantees.analysis: We rigorously analyze your needs and the existing context to propose the most optimal solution.
guarantees.privacy: At your request, our cooperation will remain completely confidential.
guarantees.conflict: Working with us ensures no conflict of interest; we do not collaborate with your partners or opponents.
guarantees.interests: You can be certain that during any negotiations or data collection, we are always on the side of your interests.

step1.title: Start of Cooperation
step1.desc: Our first meeting is 'pro bono'. We get acquainted, listen to your situation, and provide basic advice.

step2.title: Signing the Agreement
step2.desc: Our team's work begins after the agreement is signed and payment is made according to its terms.

step3.title: Service Payment
step3.desc: Payment is made via advance payment within three days from the moment of signing the agreement.

step4.title: Task Confirmation
step4.desc: We record all agreements in a messenger of your choice to avoid any misunderstandings.

hero.label: Intelligence
hero.title:
Research & 
Insights
hero.subtitle: Data-driven political intelligence and strategic analysis from the heart of Eastern Europe.
hero.desc: Our methodology combines field polling with expert geopolitical synthesis to provide actionable intelligence for a complex world.

premium.title: Premium Access
premium.desc: Get real-time alerts and exclusive geopolitical risk assessments.

featured.label: Featured Analysis
featured.title:
Quarterly Geopolitical Outlook: 
Eastern Europe Transition Dynamics
featured.desc: A comprehensive assessment of shift in diplomatic relations following the recent regional summit, focusing on energy transit corridors and security protocols in the Carpathian region.

highlights.label: Referenced In
highlights.title: Global Media Highlights
highlights.desc: PGR experts regularly provide political analysis for leading international and Ukrainian media outlets

trt.title: TRT World (October 2024)
trt.headline: Moldova Elections: Why the Presidential Race Could Strengthen Ties with Russia
trt.quote: The numbers looked stacked against Sandu going into the runoff. While she and other pro-European politicians won over 650,000 votes in the first round, 850,000 was won by Stoianoglo and candidates who either support Russia or emphasised their independence.

rbc.title: RBC-Ukraine (2024)
rbc.headline: Moldova, Romania: Electoral Process Analysis
rbc.desc: Series of expert commentary by Ruslan Rokhov about Russian interference, social media in politics, and democratic processes in Eastern Europe.

pravda.title: European Pravda (November 2024)
pravda.headline: How TikTok and Telegram Help Overthrow Romania's 'Old Guard'
pravda.desc: Analysis article by Ruslan Rokhov on social media influence in Romania's presidential elections.

kyivpost.title: Kyiv Post (February 2021)
kyivpost.headline: Ukrainians Want Regulation of Right to Bear Arms
kyivpost.desc: Presentation of PGR Consulting Group and Info Sapiens national survey results.

firearms.title: Firearms Regulation in Ukraine: Public Opinion
firearms.desc: Comprehensive study of Ukrainians' attitudes toward the right to bear arms.

exitpoll.title: Exit Poll: Chernivtsi Mayoral Elections
exitpoll.desc: Results of exit poll for Chernivtsi mayoral elections.

request.title: Request Expert Commentary
request.desc: PGR Consulting Group experts are available for commentary on political processes, election campaigns, and social media influence.

methodology.title:
The PGR 
Methodology.
methodology.desc: Beyond conventional consulting, we employ a multi-layered framework of sociological tracking, behavioral analysis, and strategic modeling.

s1.title: Diagnostic Audit
s1.desc: Rigorous baseline assessment of the current socio-political landscape.

s2.title: Strategic Simulation
s2.desc: Modeling potential outcomes using predictive analytics and field data.

s3.title: Deployment
s3.desc: Surgical execution of narrative and legislative strategies.

pr.title: Public Relations (PR)
pr.subtitle: Strategic communications that build trust and shape public opinion
pr.desc: In politics, perception is often more important than facts. We help political figures and organizations create the right perception through professional media relations, public events, and digital channels.

offer.strategyDesc: Development of comprehensive media relations strategy.
offer.trainingDesc: Preparation of political figures for interviews and public appearances.
offer.pressDesc: Full cycle of press conference preparation and execution.
offer.crisisDesc: Fast and effective response to reputational challenges.
offer.monitoringDesc: Continuous tracking of media mentions with tone analysis.
offer.contentDesc: Creation of quality content for media: press releases, articles.

reputation.title: Reputation Management
reputation.subtitle: Protecting and strengthening reputation amid information challenges
reputation.desc: Reputation in politics is an asset that requires constant attention. We help political figures and organizations build sustainable positive reputations.

offer.auditDesc: Comprehensive analysis of current reputation status.
offer.strategyDesc: Development of long-term reputation management strategy.
offer.monitoringDesc: Continuous tracking of mentions in traditional and digital media.
offer.crisisDesc: Rapid development and implementation of response strategy.
offer.positiveDesc: Creation and distribution of content that shapes correct perception.
offer.negativeDesc: Professional work with negative mentions and information attacks.

gr.title: Government Relations (GR)
gr.subtitle: Professional navigation in interactions with government authorities
gr.desc: Effective interaction with government authorities requires deep understanding of decision-making processes. We help organizations build productive relationships.

offer.strategyDesc: Development of comprehensive government relations strategy.
offer.stakeholderDesc: Mapping key decision-makers and analyzing their interests.
offer.legDesc: Supporting organizations in advancing legislative changes.
offer.ministryDesc: Organization of meetings and negotiation support.
offer.regulatoryDesc: Monitoring legislative changes and their impact analysis.

advocacy.title: Advocacy Campaigns
advocacy.subtitle: Systematic campaigns for implementing policy changes
advocacy.desc: Changing policy requires more than just a good idea. It requires systematic work: research, coalition building, lobbying, and media support.

offer.researchDesc: Study of public opinion and political context analysis.
offer.strategyDesc: Comprehensive advocacy campaign strategy with concrete stages.
offer.coalitionDesc: Uniting organizations and activists around a common goal.
offer.mediaDesc: Strategic media work to build public support.
offer.grassrootsDesc: Organization of public actions and petitions.

elections.title: Election Campaigns
elections.subtitle: Full-cycle support from strategy to exit polls
elections.desc: Elections are a complex process where every detail matters. We help candidates and parties develop winning strategies based on data.

offer.researchDesc: Sociological surveys to determine electoral mood.
offer.messageDesc: Creation of key campaign messages for target audiences.
offer.digitalDesc: Social media strategy and digital channel impact analysis.
offer.exitpollDesc: Professional exit polls for accurate result forecasting.

research.title: Public Opinion Research
research.subtitle: Reliable data for the right decisions
research.desc: Quality public opinion research is the foundation for effective decisions. We partner with Info Sapiens to provide precise data.

offer.nationalDesc: Representative polls at the all-Ukraine level.
offer.regionalDesc: Surveys at oblast, city, or specific regional level.
offer.exitpollDesc: Voter surveys at polling station exits.
offer.focusDesc: Qualitative research for deep understanding of motivations.
offer.omnibusDesc: Multiple clients sharing a single survey for affordability.
offer.ratingsDesc: Research of electoral ratings for parties and politicians.
